response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would greatly benefit someone like yourself who appreciates its true worth. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $11,000, which represents a significant saving compared to its market value of $12,000. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive price. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed with the purchase, please let us know. We look forward to the possibility of serving you.", "product_price": 11000}
